body:
My fix is to make sure `MyModel.allocate` can be inspect. So we don't call
`initialize` or `initialize_copy` at all.

On Mon, May 30, 2011 at 7:03 PM, josevalim <
reply@reply.github.com>wrote:

> @dmathieu that is not what I meant. Usually when variables are not defined,
> the proper fix is not to add a defined?() check, but ensure that both
> initialize and initialize_copy are initializing the variable (in this case,
> @attributes).
>
